meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be sent through the mail.
meanings.sent1: The mailability of the package made it convenient to send to my friend.
meanings.sent2: The mailability of the letter allowed it to be delivered quickly.
meanings.sent3: I never knew the importance of mailability until I had to send out all these invitations.
meanings.sent4: Her efficiency in ensuring the mailability of the parcels was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The mailability of the postcards made them the perfect choice for sharing vacation memories.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily packaged and shipped.
meanings.sent1: The mailability of the product simplified the shipping process.
meanings.sent2: We prioritize mailability when designing our products for online orders.
meanings.sent3: The company's success was partly due to the exceptional mailability of their goods.
meanings.sent4: The mailability of the items allowed for cost-effective distribution.
meanings.sent5: The seamless mailability of the packages saved time and resources during delivery.
